info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 6:12AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Areas of heavy Rain and snow this morning... A cold front is moving southward through North Central MT currently. Bands of heavy rain and snow are accompanying the frontal passage. Expect rain below 6000 feet initially, which will gradually change to snow in about one to two hours. Above 6000 feet, mostly snow is expected. Visibility will fall below one mile in areas of snow. Snowfall rates near one inch per hour area likely in the Kings Hill area this morning. Those traveling in North Central MT this morning should be prepared for quickly changing road conditions and areas of poor visibility.
